COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x146
STRING: I woke up unusually early in the morning today.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x152
STRING: And my feet headed for school by reflex.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15e
STRING: The first thing I had to do was report to Ms. Cordell.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x174
STRING: After hearing Lise say the word “partner” that night for
the first time, I'd made up my mind.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18a
STRING: According to the clock, it was fifteen minutes before the
first period of lessons.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c0
STRING: She wasn't in the room; perhaps she'd stepped out.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1cc
STRING: But the door was unlocked, so I knew she'd return soon.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e2
STRING: She didn't have any more one-on-one lessons starting
today, but she was always stationed here.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f8
STRING: To instruct students who came, as necessary.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x204
STRING: In addition, she was also supposed to be here for her
own students.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21a
STRING: I didn't think I'd have a chance to play the Fortelle for
her, so I hadn't brought my case.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x230
STRING: Just as I was running out of ways to pass the time, the
door opened.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x272
STRING: [Cordell] “...Hmm? Oh, it's you, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x288
STRING: [Chris] “Good morning.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a6
STRING: [Cordell] “Morning. It seems you remembered our
arrangement.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2bc
STRING: [Chris] “Yes. That's what I'm here to talk about.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2da
STRING: [Cordell] “Well done. I'll explain everything to the
backup candidate, whose services will no longer be
needed.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2fa
STRING: [Chris] “I haven't even said anything yet... How did you
know?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x318
STRING: [Cordell] “Your face says it all.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x346
STRING: How many years have I
been in charge of you?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x352
STRING: [Chris] “Almost two, I suppose.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x384
STRING: [Cordell] “Yes. From this point on, there's not much for
me to say.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3a4
STRING: Then she smiled.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3cc
STRING: [Cordell] “Do your best for the performance. Try not to
come here until then.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3ec
STRING: [Chris] “Understood. I won't bother you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x41e
STRING: [Cordell] “That's fine. But I'll be using this room from
time to time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x434
STRING: [Chris] “...Is that so?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x452
STRING: [Cordell] “Some special classes are still being held. Not
that I have any students left, though.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x472
STRING: [Chris] “...I see. Will you do something in the lecture
rooms?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4a4
STRING: [Cordell] “Who knows. Perhaps I'll compose.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4d2
STRING: I used to do
that all the time during lectures when I was a student.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4e8
STRING: Ms. Cordell sounded wistful.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4f4
STRING: From her demeanor, it didn't look like Ms. Cordell had a
bad impression of Grave.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x50a
STRING: If you ignored his demanding attitude toward music,
perhaps he was a decent person after all.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x520
STRING: For that very reason, if our graduation recital
performance was noteworthy, Lise's song might gain his
recognition.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x53e
STRING: [Cordell] “Anything else? I see you didn't bring your
Fortelle today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x55e
STRING: [Chris] “I came only to deliver my report.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x57c
STRING: [Cordell] “Are you taking practice seriously?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x592
STRING: [Chris] “Of course. Besides, if I'm here too often, I might
get you in trouble. After all, you're supposed to be
unaware of it, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5d8
STRING: [Cordell] “That's a good excuse to skip practice.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5ee
STRING: Ms. Cordell smiled, bringing the conversation to an end
with that joke.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x616
STRING: [Cordell] “Come back if anything happens.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x62c
STRING: [Chris] “Thank you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x642
STRING: I bowed deeply, and left the classroom.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x660
STRING: It was still early.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x66c
STRING: But, Lise would only come to my room after the end of
classes.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x682
STRING: There was nothing for me to do in school, so I decided
to go home.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6ca
STRING: In my room, I played the Fortelle aimlessly while waiting
for Lise.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6e0
STRING: But it was already way past the end of classes.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6f6
STRING: As a first year I had homeroom and such, so I rarely
went home right after classes, but even taking that into
account, it was late.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x716
STRING: [Chris] “...What's going on?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x750
STRING: [Phorni] “I don't think she's coming...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x766
STRING: Hovering about the Fortelle, Phorni sounded quite
bored.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x77c
STRING: She had met Lise on the night of Natale, but for my
sake, perhaps, she didn't show herself at all then.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x792
STRING: Furthermore, Phorni hadn't heard Lise's singing yet.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x79e
STRING: I'd tried to describe how great it was, but she'd
understand so much more if she just heard it once.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7b4
STRING: That's why I wanted Phorni to hear it as soon as
possible, but...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7ca
STRING: [Chris] “Well... Let's wait a bit longer.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7e0
STRING: With that, I placed my fingers on the Fortelle.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7ec
STRING: Actually, I hadn't played that song for Phorni yet.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7f8
STRING: I figured it wouldn't mean very much without Lise's
voice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x80e
STRING: So I picked other songs, and performed some
ensembles with Phorni.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x850
STRING: It was really getting quite late.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x85c
STRING: [Chris] “Strange...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x88e
STRING: [Phorni] “...Yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8a4
STRING: Phorni was also getting worried.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8b0
STRING: I knew where her house was after walking her home
last time, and many times, I thought of going to get her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8c6
STRING: But it was probable that we'd miss each other.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8d2
STRING: That was even more likely, since she'd come here once
she finished whatever it was she was doing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8f8
STRING: [Chris] “Ah... Coming!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x910
STRING: That was probably Lise.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x91c
STRING: Opening the door in a hurry-

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x95c
STRING: [Lise] “...I-I'm sorry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x972
STRING: [Chris] “...Lise?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x988
STRING: Lise was standing in front of the door, looking very
pained.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x994
STRING: I could tell at a glance that she wasn't feeling well, so I
hurried her into the room, just like last time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9aa
STRING: Then Lise raised one hand to show me something she
was carrying.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9c0
STRING: It was the umbrella I'd forced her to accept last time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9cc
STRING: [Chris] “...You've been using it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9e2
STRING: On closer inspection, I noticed that the umbrella was
dripping wet, while she was relatively dry.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9f8
STRING: [Chris] “Anyway, go inside.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa16
STRING: [Lise] “...Okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa3e
STRING: I made her sit down, and prepared a warm drink for her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa4a
STRING: And just like last time, I asked her for a reason.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa56
STRING: [Chris] “...So, what happened this time? Why is your
neck bandaged?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa88
STRING: [Lise] “...Well...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa9e
STRING: Her throat seemed to be causing her a lot of pain.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaaa
STRING: Every time Lise tried to speak, she'd cough and screw
up her face in agony, so she gave up and wrote out
what she wanted to say instead.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaca
STRING: Apparently, Lise had caught a cold.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xad6
STRING: It'd gone down to her throat, making her almost unable
to speak.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xae2
STRING: Seeing her in front of me, I could feel how much she
was suffering.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaee
STRING: In any case, the bandage around her neck was packed
full of an herbal remedy that was good for sore throats,
apparently.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb1a
STRING: [Chris] “So you... caught a cold?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb44
STRING: Lise finished writing and nodded emphatically.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb50
STRING: Her throat still looked painful, but it was better than I'd
thought at first.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb66
STRING: As long as she didn't say anything, she seemed fine.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb7c
STRING: [Chris] “...Then why did you come? Like I said last time,
you shouldn't force yourself.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbb2
STRING: Lise shook her head.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbbe
STRING: And then she continued writing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbca
STRING: If I don't talk, it's okay.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbd6
STRING: And we agreed to meet today, so I thought you'd be
worried.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbec
STRING: [Chris] “...This is exactly the same conversation we had
last time...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc16
STRING: [Chris] “Do you have a fever too?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc2c
STRING: Lise shook her head, but I put my palm on her forehead
anyway.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc40
STRING: [Lise] “Hmm...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc6a
STRING: [Chris] “Looks like you don't have one, that's a relief.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc9c
STRING: [Phorni] “Hey, so she can't sing?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcb2
STRING: I couldn't answer her now, but Phorni, who had been
quiet until then, asked in dismay.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcc8
STRING: Without Lise noticing, I looked at Phorni and nodded.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcec
STRING: [Chris] “...Well, there's no way we can practice today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd1e
STRING: [Lise] “...Mmm.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd34
STRING: Lise showed me what she'd written.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd40
STRING: I want to hear you play the Fortelle, Chris.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd4c
STRING: [Chris] “...Hmm?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd7e
STRING: [Lise] “...Mmm.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd94
STRING: I'd planned to play it anyway, and I'd practiced with
Phorni earlier so I was ready.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdaa
STRING: But it felt a little sad to play without Lise's singing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdc0
STRING: I didn't feel that way when practicing by myself, but
having her next to me made it apparent.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdd6
STRING: [Chris] “Sure, why not. The same as always?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe00
STRING: Phorni nodded and sat down in front of the Fortelle.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe32
STRING: [Phorni] “There won't be any singing, but that's fine.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe48
STRING: [Chris] “...Here we go.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe5e
STRING: Phorni had seemed a little upset, but perhaps her mood
improved, because she moved to the desk to hear the
sound of the Fortelle more clearly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe9a
STRING: I was off to a good start.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xea6
STRING: I hadn't heard Lise's voice at all recently, and started to
miss it the more I played.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xebc
STRING: Lise held a caffé latte in one hand as she listened, while
Phorni, for some reason, was looking at me in surprise.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xed2
STRING: My fingers were moving smoothly, while my mind was
somewhere distant.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xee0
STRING: Thinking about Lise.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xeee
STRING: To put it in words, very simply, I felt many things for her,
all of which I surrendered to music.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf04
STRING: I played, not according to the composer's intentions,
but while investing the piece with my own will.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf5c
STRING: During the songs that followed, Phorni seemed to get
into the groove and even started to sing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf72
STRING: There were songs that I'd practiced many times with
Phorni, songs I'd practiced less often with Fal, and amid
all this time flew by.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf92
STRING: [Chris] “...Phew, I guess that'll do.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfc4
STRING: [Lise] “...Mmm.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfda
STRING: “Thank you very much.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfe6
STRING: Lise wrote that out very neatly, and bowed while
remaining seated.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xffc
STRING: [Chris] “You're welcome.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1012
STRING: “Today's performance was great.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x101e
STRING: “This was my first time hearing your song, but it was like
I could hear someone else singing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1034
STRING: [Chris] “R-Really...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x104a
STRING: I suddenly remembered that Phorni had been singing,
but until now, no one else had ever been able to hear
her voice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x106a
STRING: Besides, she hadn't reacted when Phorni was speaking
to me, so perhaps it was just a feeling she had.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1080
STRING: [Chris] “Uh... Never mind. You should be getting home
soon, shouldn't you?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10b4
STRING: Lise gave a little start when she looked at the clock.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10c0
STRING: [Chris] “...Not good, huh.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10f2
STRING: [Lise] “...Hmm.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1108
STRING: [Chris] “It's late, I'll walk you home.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1134
STRING: Lise shook her head, but I ignored her and got ready to
head out.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x114a
STRING: [Chris] “Alright, let's go.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11de
STRING: Sharing the umbrella, the two of us walked through the
city at night.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11ea
STRING: When we reached the main street, Lise's house was just
a short distance away, but we had gotten closer.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1200
STRING: Her foot seemed much better now, and she was
walking normally, almost.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1216
STRING: Our shoulders were nearly touching as we continued
walking, silently, toward Lise's house.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x125c
STRING: [Chris] “Okay, guess I'll head back now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1272
STRING: I did all the talking, so Lise wouldn't have to say
anything.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1288
STRING: I also decided to sketch out our schedule for the
coming days.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1294
STRING: [Chris] “You probably can't sing for a while, though. Ah,
don't speak, just nod or shake your head, I'll ask yes or
no questions.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12da
STRING: Lise nodded once.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12e6
STRING: [Chris] “What should we do about practice until then?
...You can't answer that, huh.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1306
STRING: [Chris] “Until you recover, we can't go without practice,
right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1330
STRING: Nod.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x133c
STRING: [Chris] “Practice rooms at school?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1366
STRING: Head shake.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1372
STRING: [Chris] “Maybe we should take a break?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1388
STRING: Head shake.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1394
STRING: [Chris] “...My room?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13be
STRING: Nod.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13d2
STRING: [Lise] “...Yes.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13e8
STRING: [Chris] “...In that case, come whenever you want to. I'll
run errands while you're at school.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1408
STRING: Lise nodded energetically.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1414
STRING: [Chris] “Then I'll see you... Tomorrow?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1446
STRING: [Lise] “Ah...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x145c
STRING: Lise shook her head sadly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1468
STRING: [Chris] “You have something to do tomorrow?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x147e
STRING: Nod.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x148a
STRING: [Chris] “I see. Well, even if you came, you'd only be able
to hear me play the Fortelle anyway.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14be
STRING: Lise didn't have to move her head that time, she just
smiled instead.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14d4
STRING: [Chris] “So the next time you can come over will be...
Friday?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14f0
STRING: Lise nodded, then waved as she entered her house.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14fc
STRING: She was still holding on to that umbrella.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1508
STRING: I didn't know if she'd snuck out today too, but I saw her
go inside by some unseen path, not the front door, after
which I headed home.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1560
STRING: [Chris] “I'm home.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x159a
STRING: [Phorni] “Welcome back.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15b0
STRING: Even though it was my second time outside today,
Phorni had prepared a towel for me, as always.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15c6
STRING: I wiped my hair and body dry, then went inside.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15d2
STRING: [Chris] “It's a shame you didn't get to hear her sing,
though.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1604
STRING: [Phorni] “Yes, quite.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1632
STRING: But I got to hear you play the
Fortelle, so that's alright.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1648
STRING: [Chris] “You hear it all the time, don't you?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1666
STRING: [Phorni] “Not that song, that was the first time you'd
played it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x167c
STRING: [Chris] “True. So, how was it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16ae
STRING: [Phorni] “Is it a love song?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16c4
STRING: [Chris] “...Huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16f6
STRING: [Phorni] “Uh, I can't explain it, but that's the impression I
got.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x170c
STRING: [Chris] “...I don't think so.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x173e
STRING: [Phorni] “Hold on, I've got it. It reminds me of a song
that we always perform together, Chris, that's why.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x175e
STRING: [Chris] “...Erm, that's a completely different story?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1790
STRING: [Phorni] “Well, it has its own melody, but... Mood,
perhaps? I think something like that is similar, that's all.
Nothing important.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17ba
STRING: It seemed Phorni wasn't making fun of me, but giving
her honest opinion instead.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17d0
STRING: And because it was quite late, she said good night and
then disappeared.
